Toberak's projects in GDT

Mar 26, 2023 • toberak

Discord Twitter Youtube Instagram Facebook

Since 2019 until 2022 building the eSport escene for @BadlandBrawl
We began humbly competing among friends, to reach, over more than two years, international competitions with more than 1500 participants, along the way acquiring partnerships with developers and with the largest crowdfunding organization of eSports Matcherino, being successful in each event.
This is a Badland Brawl esports leagues, tournaments, competitions, events and challenges

Always attentive to what the community suggested, we knew how to position ourselves as the main events for all levels of players.
Beginners compete with beginners through our revolutionary category system.
Weekly challenges and tournaments, competitions for combos, team leagues, raffles and more!

Toberak's Projects

  • toberak.com@gmail.com
  • Toberak1
  • reyconejo87

Toberak is renowned for founding GDT, an organization for esports events on Discord with official support, focused on Badland Brawl. He has also partnered with Matcherino to enhance crowdfunding and has become a key figure in the development of esports events on an international scale. His ability to organize exciting and fun events has made a significant impact on the gaming community worldwide.
